entities.description: Fred and George are mentioned as Percy's brothers who were bothering Mr. Bagman.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who would be rushing to tell Mrs. Weasley about the situation.

entities.name: zokos joke shop

relationships.description: Bagman was advising Fred and George on the marketing of their fake wands.
Bagman has contacts at Zonko's Joke Shop.
